idea: Innosapien Technologies is a wearable computing and augmented reality company.
name: INNOSAPIEN TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Verimates is an email messaging system which was developed because of a scam attempt. A person located in London, England impersonated one of our sister companies and sent an email to a bank trying to commit us to a deal we never approved of. This person’s email appeared so strong with fake credentials and using our name that the receiving bank accepted to close the deal. But, fortunately, they contacted us for some clarifications thus enabling us to find out about the attempted fraud just in time.
 Verimates is a verified ID mailing system
 Validates the identity of Sender of the mail
 Verimates is a revolutionary Platform in the pursuit of eliminating email fraud.
name: Verimates (India) Private Limited

idea:
Nine2FiveWorld is a technology enabled commercial realty advisory firm offering comprehensive office space listings in ready and under construction buildings in Mumbai. We provide the full spectrum of services, ranging from occupancy planning and site visits till documentation and occupation.
Our emphasis is on providing well-researched and actionable information to enable occupiers and investors take the most optimal decisions on their commercial property requirements. All listings on this site have been verified and data displayed is authentic, to the best of our knowledge. Multiple search modes with a wide variety of filters makes search easy and virtually instantaneous. Availability of large number of site images almost does the work of an actual visit.
Our proprietary ratings system helps you differentiate between buildings. Ratings indicate the ability of each building to attract a particular value, either in terms of capital values or lease rentals.
We offer the most competitive brokerage charges in the industry, while at the same time providing clients with unparalleled width and depth in listings information. In an industry which is well known for its opaqueness and lack of data, we are making attempting to bring a long overdue change.
name: nine2fiveworld.com

idea: Intangea Advisors LLP is an Intellectual Property boutique firm based in Mumbai specialising in Trade Marks, Patents, Copyrights, and Industrial Designs.
name: INTANGEA ADVISORS LLP

idea:
We are a start-up with an ideal mix of academic, corporate and Web professionals who felt the shared need to provide quality education with innovative means and methods.

We have developed a unique idea of providing KABIL CYBER SECURITY OFFICERS to industry as well as Government, Semi Government organisations etc.

This will generate huge employment opportunities for unemployed young computer literate persons and also fulfil the vision statement of Government of India.

Our main focus is towards generating new employment opportunities as well as enhancing the earning level of young people of India by using innovative tools and methods with the help of latest technology.
name: KABIL EDUCATION AND TECHNOLOGY SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
NSi Tech Consulting's mission is to help India’s small business harness the power of technology and innovation to be successful in today’s increasingly digital world.


Our services are focused towards making MSMEs more productive & responsive by enabling them with new tools, methodologies & processes. They key services we wish to offer are as below - 

- Recommend and implement Office digitization / e-Office solutions

- Recommend and implement software tools for Business

- Help you move to Agile way of working

- Help build a culture of Collaboration and Innovation in your organization  

- Website creation, Social Media strategy and Brand-building
name: NSi Tech Consulting
